alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Franklin; Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 4:44AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Franklin, southeastern Crawford and Sebastian Counties through 530 AM CDT... At 443 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles north of Charleston to near Midland. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Ozark... Charleston... Greenwood... Alma... Barling... Lavaca... Mulberry... Mansfield... Dyer... Hackett... Altus... Hartford... Huntington... Bonanza... Branch... Midland... Denning... Wiederkehr Village... Excelsior... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 10 and 19. Interstate 540 near mile marker 9, and between mile markers 12 and 13. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
